original_text: Someone may get rich because he cheats other people. He is like a bird that sits on eggs that it has taken from another nest. He will lose his riches before he is old. At the end of his life, he will die as a fool.’ Jeremiah's prayer Someone may get rich because he cheats other people.
korean_text: 불의로 치부하는 자는 자고새가 낳지 아니한 알을 품음 같아서 그의 중년에 그것이 떠나겠고 마침내 어리석은 자가 되리라

sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람은 부자가 될 수 있다
왜냐하면 그는 다른 사람을 속이기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: that it has taken from another nest
At the end of his life
he will die as a fool
Someone may get rich because he cheats other people
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람은 다른 사람을 속여 부자가 될 수 있다
